title: Deathfire Touch Not Working on Teemo.  WAI?
body: Deathfire Touch mastery does not work on Teemo Shroom (R), or his (E).  It only works on his Blinding Dart (Q).  Is this working as intended?

replies.body:
Teemo's E is an on-hit effect. Brand's passive is a spell effect.

It does work on Nidalee traps. It does work on Teemo's mushrooms.
I think R may be a bug, but I'm 99% sure not working on E is intended, just like stuff like Luden's Echo/ Liandry's torment and such don't proc from it either.
Why does it work on Brand passive, which isn't even a spell, but not work on Teemo E or R?

Teemo E is an on-hit effect, so it doesn't count as a spell while Brand's passive applies spell effects.

Not sure on R though.

Teemo E is an on-hit effect, not a damaging spell.  Most on-hit effects do not apply on-spell-hit effects.  You wouldn't expect it to work on Oriana's innate, would you?

I do not know why it doesn't work on his R.  That seems like a probable bug.
Are you sure, bc I could have swore it was working with the E. Went mid lvling E, Deathfire, and corruption pot.. worked really well against Yas lol
Teemo's R no longer procs spell effects (i've seen this reported in other threads -- doesn't proc rylai's, landry's, luden's).  Not sure if stealth nerf or bug.
It was working last time I fought Teemo. Must be a bug in some games.
I was so salty when I realized that this keystone only works with his E. This keystone SHOULD be the best for Teemo, instead due to it only working on Q it is garbage for him.
It was working on my R in the last game I did.

So it works on Nidalee traps, but not Teemo traps.

It works on Brand passive, but not Teemo E.  

What gives?!  Is this WAI or bug?
His E is considered a Slightly empowered basic atack, so it SHOULD work, but i dont believe it works on shrooms, being that they arent really cast, they are set.
